heading: HR00071
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE SPECIAL HOUSE COMMITTEE ON BICOL RECOVERY AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE POLICIES IMPLEMENTED BY THE GOVERNMENT TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF AND/OR TOTALLY ERADICATE THE COCONUT SCALE INSECT (ASPIDIOTUS RIGIDUS) IN THE BICOL REGION TO PROTECT ITS COCONUT INDUSTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on BICOL RECOVERY AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT since 2016-09-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00071
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE SPECIAL HOUSE COMMITTEE ON BICOL RECOVERY AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE POLICIES IMPLEMENTED BY THE GOVERNMENT TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF AND/OR TOTALLY ERADICATE THE COCONUT SCALE INSECT (ASPIDIOTUS RIGIDUS) IN THE BICOL REGION TO PROTECT ITS COCONUT INDUSTRY
